origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenAgricultureAPI.analyze_companies', 'description': 'This function analyzes the financial data of specified green agriculture companies over a given period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_list', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of company names to analyze.'}, {'name': 'data_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period for which to analyze data, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'A detailed analysis of the companies financial data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenAgricultureAPI.analyze_companies, 它的参数输入如下: 'company_list'是['GreenFarm1', 'GreenFarm2'], 'data_period'是'last_year'.
